title: Unhandled Exception - panic: runtime error: index out of range [32] with length 32
body:
I run a cluster of over 30 Erigon full archive nodes. About 30-50% have been having this unhandled panic causing the application to completely exit. I restarted the Application, and it seems to progress.

May be related to:
- https://github.com/golang/go/issues/60860
- https://github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/issues/1173

**Version**
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon -v
erigon version 2.49.0-dev-8983128d
```

**Command**
#bin/bash
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon \
--chain=mainnet \
--torrent.upload.rate="1024mb" \
--torrent.download.rate="1024mb" \
--datadir="$(eval echo ~$USER)/erigon-eth" \
--internalcl \
--chain=mainnet \
--port=30501 \
--http.port=9201 \
--authrpc.port=9101 \
--authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--authrpc.vhosts=* \
--torrent.port=42501 \
--private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 \
--nat="extip:$(curl -s ifconfig.me)" \
--http \
--http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool \
--ws \
--ws.compression
```

```
INFO[09-19|02:04:08.874] head updated                             hash=0x6c1b7d9718a6a3ca96697f0d9d491b4dbfc7bf9bfa0a5c271b9d81253bfd84ec number=18165895
INFO[09-19|02:04:08.952] [5/7 Execution] Completed on             block=18165896

panic: runtime error: index out of range [32] with length 32

goroutine 102629835 [running]:

        github.com/tidwall/btree@v1.6.0/map.go:504

        github.com/tidwall/btree@v1.6.0/map.go:497 +0x45
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/persistence.(*GossipSource).PurgeRange(0xc17e0e36d8?, {0x5707d6?, 0x2d925a0?}, 0xc07fa10500?, 0xc21e90aeb0?)
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/persistence/block_store.go:112 +0xf5
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/phase1/stages.ConsensusClStages.func16({0x2d925a0, 0xc21e90aeb0}, {0x2da4870?, 0xc0a89a7b60?}, 0xc032c18780, {0x18, 0x381cd, 0x381ce, 0x7039c6, 0x7039c6})

github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/clstages.(*StageGraph[...]).StartWithStage.func1()
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/clstages/clstages.go:39 +0xe4
created by github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/clstages.(*StageGraph[...]).StartWithStage
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cl/clstages/clstages.go:33 +0x3e5
```
I think you didnâ€™t upgrade to 2.49.2
I just updated now and have not had a repeat of this issue. I will reopen if I do.

Still happening on 2.49.2

```
INFO[09-20|19:36:03.365] [3/12 Senders] Started                   from=18169299 to=18178633
panic: runtime error: index out of range [32] with length 32

```

Specifically still occurring on
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon --version
erigon version 2.49.2-stable-a8ae8a03
```

Here's another node same issue:
